thread.title: Pascal Wehrlein rolls during the Race of Champions
thread.title_full: Pascal Wehrlein rolls during the Race of Champions

title: Pascal Wehrlein rolls during the Race of Champions
text:
Pascal Wehrlein rolls during   Image: @RaceOfChampions/Twitter Jan 21, 2017 at 4:18p ET 0Shares 
Pascal Wehrlein and his passenger were able to walk away from a dramatic crash during   
Wehrlein was racing fellow F1 driver Felipe Massa in a Polaris Slingshot during the event   
Coming out of the final turn, Wehrlein understeered into the barriers separating the two cars, damaging his steering. His car was then sent rolling over at the end of the straight after the finish line, before coming to a rest on the perimeter barrier. Pascal Wehrlein and his passenger walked away from a big crash at #ROCMiami . https://t.co/x1mXvlxydi 
â€” Race Of Champions (@RaceOfChampions) January 21, 2017 
Wehrlein may have lost the race, but fortunately he and his passenger were able to walk away unscathed.
